description: The House voted to pass a “clean” debt-limit bill. Also on the Minute, the even higher price of a luxury car in China, and officials in India try to track down a man-eating tigress.
title: Times Minute | Debt-Limit Bill Passes
title_page: Times Minute | Debt-Limit Bill Passes - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The latest in national and international news, politics, ideas and culture delivered with smart analysis from Times reporters and editors – all in 60 seconds.
